title: Retrieve a Self-Employment Business Source Accounting Summary (BSAS)
description: This endpoint allows the user to request a specific Business Source Accounting Summary using a unique identifier. By default, when it is available the adjusted summary will be returned. A filter can be set to specify whether the original or the adjusted is to be returned.

metadata.description: Object containing the identifying data for the business and associated information for the BSAS with this ID

taxYear.description: The tax year into which this accounting period falls

bsas.description: Object holding the BSAS for the self employment business income source.

accountingAdjustments.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net profit of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

taxable.description: The taxable net profit of the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net loss of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

adjustedIncomeTax.description: The adjusted income tax loss. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

incomeBreakdown.description: Total income broken down by type for the accounting period.

turnover.description: The takings, fees, sales or money earned by your business. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

other.description: Any other business income not included in turnover. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

expensesBreakdown.description: Total expenses broken down by type for the accounting period.

costOfGoodsBought.description: Cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

cisPaymentsToSubcontractors.description: Payments to subcontractors - Construction Industry Scheme (CIS). Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

staffCosts.description: Wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel expenses. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

maintenanceCosts.description: Repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

advertisingCosts.description: Advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

businessEntertainmentCosts.description: Business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

interest.description: Interest on bank and other loans. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

financialCharges.description: Bank, credit card and other financial charges. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

professionalFees.description: Accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

other.description: Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

consolidatedExpenses.description: Sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

additionsBreakdown.description: A breakdown of the adjustable additions for the accounting period.
